charaepi_ch0102_90_bell/2301_1101_0100_2:
While walking through the forest,
[Name:PlayerNickname ] spotted Bianca and
Sonia having a friendly chat.
charaepi_ch0102_90_bell/2301_0401_0400_1: No, the two of us were just chatting!
charaepi_ch0102_90_bell/2301_0302_0500_1: You look like you’re having fun.
charaepi_ch0102_90_bell/2301_0402_0600_1: Sure are! We’ve been chatting up a storm!
charaepi_ch0102_90_bell/2301_1201_0700_1:
Professor Sonia and I were having a really
exciting talk about Virizion!
charaepi_ch0102_90_bell/2301_1201_0800_1:
I’ve studied Virizion’s footprints before in the
Crown Tundra in Galar.
charaepi_ch0102_90_bell/2301_1201_0900_1:
Virizion is a Pokémon spoken of in legend in the
Unova region.
charaepi_ch0102_90_bell/2301_1201_1000_1:
According to legend, it worked together alongside
Cobalion and Terrakion to protect Pokémon from
a war between humans!
charaepi_ch0102_90_bell/2301_1201_1100_1: I met my Virizion in Unova.
charaepi_ch0102_90_bell/2301_1201_1200_1:
Ever since we became a sync pair, I’ve been
trying to observe its whirlwind-like movements
in battle...
charaepi_ch0102_90_bell/2301_1201_1300_1: but they’re so fast my eyes can’t keep up!
charaepi_ch0102_90_bell/2301_1201_1400_1: You really are enamored with Virizion!
charaepi_ch0102_90_bell/2301_1201_1500_1:
You must be spending every day totally absorbed
in observation and research!
charaepi_ch0102_90_bell/2301_1201_1700_1:
Oh, but I’m spending just as much time training as
I am studying!
charaepi_ch0102_90_bell/2301_1201_1800_1:
Yeah, I remember you were in the middle of
training when I showed up here.
charaepi_ch0102_90_bell/2301_1201_1900_1:
Even with a Legendary Pokémon as your partner,
you understand how important training is...
I’d expect nothing less from a Neo Champion!
charaepi_ch0102_90_bell/2301_1201_2000_1:
To be honest, I’m not very good at Pokémon
battles...
charaepi_ch0102_90_bell/2301_1201_2100_1:
And back in Unova, Hilbert, Cheren, and the
others were always coming to my rescue...
charaepi_ch0102_90_bell/2301_1201_2200_1:
Being a Neo Champion that has to rely on others
so much is kinda uncool...
charaepi_ch0102_90_bell/2301_0401_2500_1:
But I’m eager to find a new side of myself—
different from how I am now.
charaepi_ch0102_90_bell/2301_0402_2700_1: Yes! It’s not that I dislike how I am now...
charaepi_ch0102_90_bell/2301_0402_2800_1: I’m just eager to find a whole new side of myself!
charaepi_ch0102_90_bell/2301_1201_2900_1: I want to take a new step forward with Virizion!
charaepi_ch0102_90_bell/2301_1201_3000_1:
I’d like to find a path that not only helps me
further my Pokémon research but also leads me to
a stronger version of myself!
charaepi_ch0102_90_bell/2301_1201_3200_1:
There are folks who are already walking along
their chosen path in life.
charaepi_ch0102_90_bell/2301_1201_3300_1:
But even they are still looking for what they can
do, and I’m sure they keep dealing with doubts
and worries as they go.
charaepi_ch0102_90_bell/2301_1201_3400_1:
Right! And as one of those people, I’m gonna give
it my all!
charaepi_ch0102_90_bell/2301_1201_3500_1:
It may take time, but I want to gain some real skill
as a Trainer!
charaepi_ch0102_90_bell/2301_1201_3600_1:
And when the time comes that I must stand up to
protect my dearest friends...
charaepi_ch0102_90_bell/2301_1201_3700_1:
I’ll be able to fight together with Virizion the way
they deserve!
